sentences.en: Abortion may occur as a complication.
sentences.cn: 流产可作为合并症而发生.

sentences.en: Acute dilatation of the stomach is a rare complication.
sentences.cn: 急性胃扩张是一种罕有的并发症.

sentences.en: An added complication is the growing concern for the environment.
sentences.cn: 还有个问题就是对环境的日益关注。

sentences.en: Blindness is a common complication of diabetes.
sentences.cn: 失明是糖尿病常见的并发症。

sentences.en: One complication which can arise is a prolapse.
sentences.cn: 可能出现的一种并发症是脱垂。

sentences.en: Oxygen toxicity is a complication of oxygen therapy.
sentences.cn: 氧中毒是氧疗的并发症.

sentences.en: Pneumococcal peritonitis may occur as a complication in children with nephrosis.
sentences.cn: 对肾病儿童来说肺炎球菌腹膜炎可作为并发症出现.

sentences.en: Pneumonia is one of the common complications faced by bed-ridden patients.
sentences.cn: 肺炎是卧床病人所面临的常见并发症之一。

sentences.en: Pulmonary aspiration is a dreaded surgical complication.
sentences.cn: 肺吸入是一种可怕的外科并发症.

sentences.en: The age difference was a complication to the rela-tionship.
sentences.cn: 年龄差异使得双方交往更加困难。

sentences.en: The age difference was a complication to the relationship.
sentences.cn: 年龄差异使得双方交往更加困难。

sentences.en: The bad weather added a further complication to our journey.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气给我们的旅行增加了更多的困难。

sentences.en: The fact that the plane was late added a further complication to our journey.
sentences.cn: 飞机误点给我们的旅行带来了更大的麻烦。

sentences.en: The most lethal complication is fulminating colitis.
sentences.cn: 最严重的致死性并发症是暴发性结肠炎.

sentences.en: The objective is to study the relativity between analgesia methods and operation complication.
sentences.cn: 目的在于研究镇痛方法与术后并发症的相关性。

sentences.en: This complication has occasionally occurred following the use of intestinal antiseptics.
sentences.cn: 这种并发症偶而发生在使用肠道抗菌剂上.
这是未预见到的复杂情况.

words.tran_cn: 使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入
并发症；复杂；复杂化；混乱

trans.tran_cn: 使复杂化的难题（或困难），〈医〉并发症
trans.tran_en: a problem or situation that makes something more difficult to understand or deal with
